Lobsterpy package¶

Command line interface¶

lobsterpy.cli module¶

Analyze and plot results from Lobster runs.

usage: cli.py [-h] {description,automatic-plot,automaticplot,create-inputs,createinputs,plot} ...

Positional Arguments¶

action

Possible choices: description, automatic-plot, automaticplot, create-inputs, createinputs, plot

Use -h/–help after the chosen subcommand to see further options.

Sub-commands:¶

description¶

Deliver a text description of the COHP results from Lobster and VASP. Implementation of COBIs and COOPs will follow.

cli.py description [-h] [--poscar POSCAR] [--charge CHARGE] [--icohplist ICOHPLIST] [--cohpcar COHPCAR] [--incar INCAR] [--potcar POTCAR] [--json [FILENAME]] [--allbonds]
Input files¶
--poscar, --POSCAR

path to POSCAR. Default is “POSCAR”

Default: POSCAR

--charge

path to Charge.lobster. Default is “CHARGE.lobster”

Default: CHARGE.lobster

--icohplist

path to ICOHPLIST.lobster. Default is “ICOHPLIST.lobster”

Default: ICOHPLIST.lobster

--cohpcar

path to COHPCAR.lobster. Default is “COHPCAR.lobster”. This argument will also be read when COBICARs or COOPCARs are plotted.

Default: COHPCAR.lobster

--incar

path to INCAR. Default is “INCAR”.

Default: INCAR

--potcar

path to POTCAR. Default is “POTCAR”.

Default: POTCAR

Automatic analysis¶
--json

Write a JSON file with the most important information

--allbonds, --all-bonds

This option will force the automatc analysis to consider all bonds, not only cation-anion bonds (default)

Default: False

automatic-plot (automaticplot)¶

Plot most important COHPs automatically. Implementation of COBIs and COOPs will follow. This option also includes an automatic description.

cli.py automatic-plot [-h] [--poscar POSCAR] [--charge CHARGE] [--icohplist ICOHPLIST] [--cohpcar COHPCAR] [--incar INCAR] [--potcar POTCAR] [--json [FILENAME]] [--allbonds] [--sigma SIGMA | --fwhm FWHM]
                      [--integrated] [--ylim YLIM YLIM] [--xlim XLIM XLIM] [--style STYLE [STYLE ...]] [--no-base-style] [--title TITLE] [--save-plot FILENAME] [--width WIDTH] [--height HEIGHT]
                      [--fontsize FONTSIZE]
Named Arguments¶
--sigma

Standard deviation of Gaussian broadening.

--fwhm

Full-width-half-maximum of Gaussian broadening.

Input files¶
--poscar, --POSCAR

path to POSCAR. Default is “POSCAR”

Default: POSCAR

--charge

path to Charge.lobster. Default is “CHARGE.lobster”

Default: CHARGE.lobster

--icohplist

path to ICOHPLIST.lobster. Default is “ICOHPLIST.lobster”

Default: ICOHPLIST.lobster

--cohpcar

path to COHPCAR.lobster. Default is “COHPCAR.lobster”. This argument will also be read when COBICARs or COOPCARs are plotted.

Default: COHPCAR.lobster

--incar

path to INCAR. Default is “INCAR”.

Default: INCAR

--potcar

path to POTCAR. Default is “POTCAR”.

Default: POTCAR

Automatic analysis¶
--json

Write a JSON file with the most important information

--allbonds, --all-bonds

This option will force the automatc analysis to consider all bonds, not only cation-anion bonds (default)

Default: False

Plotting¶
--integrated

Show integrated cohp/cobi/coop plots.

Default: False

--ylim

Energy range for plots

--xlim

COHP/COBI/COOP range for plots

--style

Matplotlib style sheet(s) for plot appearance

--no-base-style, --nobasestyle

Disable inbuilt style entirely. This may prevent interference with external stylesheets when using –style.

Default: False

--title

Plot title

Default: “”

--save-plot, --saveplot, -s

Save plot to file

--width

Plot width in inches

--height

Plot height in inches

--fontsize, --font-size

Base font size

create-inputs (createinputs)¶

Will create inputs for lobster computation

cli.py create-inputs [-h] [--poscar POSCAR] [--charge CHARGE] [--icohplist ICOHPLIST] [--cohpcar COHPCAR] [--incar INCAR] [--potcar POTCAR] [--incar-out INCAROUT] [--lobsterin-out LOBSTERINOUT] [--overwrite]
Input files¶
--poscar, --POSCAR

path to POSCAR. Default is “POSCAR”

Default: POSCAR

--charge

path to Charge.lobster. Default is “CHARGE.lobster”

Default: CHARGE.lobster

--icohplist

path to ICOHPLIST.lobster. Default is “ICOHPLIST.lobster”

Default: ICOHPLIST.lobster

--cohpcar

path to COHPCAR.lobster. Default is “COHPCAR.lobster”. This argument will also be read when COBICARs or COOPCARs are plotted.

Default: COHPCAR.lobster

--incar

path to INCAR. Default is “INCAR”.

Default: INCAR

--potcar

path to POTCAR. Default is “POTCAR”.

Default: POTCAR

Output files¶
--incar-out

path to INCAR that will be generated by lobsterpy. Default is “INCAR.lobsterpy”

Default: INCAR.lobsterpy

--lobsterin-out

base for path to lobsterins that will be generated by lobsterpy. Default is “lobsterin.lobsterpy”

Default: lobsterin.lobsterpy

--overwrite

overwrites already created INCARs an lobsterins with the give name.

Default: False

plot¶

Plot specific COHPs/COBIs/COOPs based on bond numbers.

cli.py plot [-h] [--poscar POSCAR] [--charge CHARGE] [--icohplist ICOHPLIST] [--cohpcar COHPCAR] [--incar INCAR] [--potcar POTCAR] [--sigma SIGMA | --fwhm FWHM] [--integrated] [--ylim YLIM YLIM]
            [--xlim XLIM XLIM] [--style STYLE [STYLE ...]] [--no-base-style] [--title TITLE] [--save-plot FILENAME] [--width WIDTH] [--height HEIGHT] [--fontsize FONTSIZE] [--cobis | --coops]
            [--summed | --orbitalwise ORBITALWISE [ORBITALWISE ...]]
            bond_numbers [bond_numbers ...]
Positional Arguments¶
bond_numbers

List of bond numbers, determining COHPs/COBIs/COOPs to include in plot.

Named Arguments¶
--sigma

Standard deviation of Gaussian broadening.

--fwhm

Full-width-half-maximum of Gaussian broadening.

--cobis, --cobi

Plot COBIs

Default: False

--coops, --coop

Plot COOPs

Default: False

--summed

Show a summed COHP

Default: False

--orbitalwise

Plot cohps of specific orbitals. e.g. to plot 2s-2s interaction of bond with label 1, use “lobsterpy plot 1 –orbitalwise 2s-2s”. To plot all orbitalwise cohps of one bond, you can use “all” instead of “2s-2s”. To plot orbitalwise interactions of more than one bond, use, for example, “lobsterpy plot 1 1 –orbitalwise “3s-3s” “2px-3s”

Input files¶
--poscar, --POSCAR

path to POSCAR. Default is “POSCAR”

Default: POSCAR

--charge

path to Charge.lobster. Default is “CHARGE.lobster”

Default: CHARGE.lobster

--icohplist

path to ICOHPLIST.lobster. Default is “ICOHPLIST.lobster”

Default: ICOHPLIST.lobster

--cohpcar

path to COHPCAR.lobster. Default is “COHPCAR.lobster”. This argument will also be read when COBICARs or COOPCARs are plotted.

Default: COHPCAR.lobster

--incar

path to INCAR. Default is “INCAR”.

Default: INCAR

--potcar

path to POTCAR. Default is “POTCAR”.

Default: POTCAR

Plotting¶
--integrated

Show integrated cohp/cobi/coop plots.

Default: False

--ylim

Energy range for plots

--xlim

COHP/COBI/COOP range for plots

--style

Matplotlib style sheet(s) for plot appearance

--no-base-style, --nobasestyle

Disable inbuilt style entirely. This may prevent interference with external stylesheets when using –style.

Default: False

--title

Plot title

Default: “”

--save-plot, --saveplot, -s

Save plot to file

--width

Plot width in inches

--height

Plot height in inches

--fontsize, --font-size

Base font size

This package provides the modules for analyzing Lobster files
